title: Manzanar National Historic Site: Bookstore
body: Bookstore         MHA photo                    The Manzanar Store is operated by Manzanar History Association (MHA). The store features a wide selection of books, DVDs, art prints, posters, T-shirts, gift items and more.  Manzanar History Association is proud to be a partner in preserving Manzanar and sharing its stories with visitors today and generations to come. Your purchases from Manzanar Store directly support educational and interpretive programs at Manzanar National Historic Site.   Contact us for more information: Manzanar History Association P.O. Box 149 Independence, CA 93526 Tel. (760) 878-2727 Toll Free: (877) 424-2411 manzanar.mha@suddenlinkmail.com      td>
